int main() {
  int T;
  cin >> T;
  
  while (T--) {
    int N;
    cin >> N;

    int arr[N];
    f(i, 0, N-1) cin >> arr[i];

    int maxcnt = 0, currcnt = 0;
    f(i, 0, N-2) {
      if (arr[i] == arr[i+1]) currcnt++;
      else {
        maxcnt = maxcnt > currcnt ? maxcnt : currcnt;
        currcnt = 0;
      }
    }
    maxcnt = maxcnt > currcnt ? maxcnt : currcnt;
    cout << maxcnt << endl;
  }

  return 0;
}
